attacks.name: Agility
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to this Pokémon during your opponent’s next turn.

attacks.name: Volt Tackle
attacks.effect: This Pokémon does 30 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Tail Break GX
attacks.effect: Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)
